Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You kiddin' me? The power of love is no
match for this kinda cold!

At this rate, we're gonna freeze to death
before we get to meet the <clr:0000>legendary
shield surfer<clr:ffff>.
Come on, can't you catch us a
<clr:0000>summerwing butterfly<clr:ffff> so we can
make a <clr:0000>spicy elixir<clr:ffff>?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, you should be sure to thank him
nice 'n' proper like.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Yammo... I... *sigh* Even my heart is
cold now.
Talk_07:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for helping us!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We took a break in this here vacant house
to <clr:0000>get away from the cold<clr:ffff>, and before we
knew it, monsters had us surrounded.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I still can't believe you came to help us.
You really did save us, you know.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Ever since <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>, there've been
more and more monsters. We were trying
to be careful, but...
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Ah, hold on! You're lugging around too
much stuff already, aren't ya?<sp:0:4:0>I was going to give you a spicy elixir
as a little thank-you gift.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I'll wait until you've cleared out some
room for it.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't know how to thank you enough,
but please, take this...
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was planning to give you a spicy elixir as
a little thank-you gift for saving us...

But it looks like you're already carrying
as much as you can carry. So, lemme
know when you lighten your load, OK?
Oh, uh...or did you want to ask me
something about <clr:0000>shield surfing<clr:ffff>?
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Looks like you've finally got some room
to carry stuff.<sp:0:4:0>So here ya go...<sp:5:0:0> Just a little gift to say
thanks for saving us!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Ah, but it doesn't feel like it's thanks
enough. Not for someone who saved
our lives...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Of course you are! You hauled yourself to
a place covered in snow, so you gotta
know a thing or two about shield surfing!
Anyhoo, just remember, after you get the
shield into position, all ya gotta do is
jump on it and ride.
But of course, there'll be no surfin' for
you if you don't <clr:0000>get some momentum<clr:ffff>
goin'. It's kinda tricky like that, eh?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Shield surfing is a way of gettin' around
by ridin' and slidin' on a <clr:0000>shield<clr:ffff>.

First you hold up a shield, then you <clr:0000>jump<clr:ffff>
on it and ride!

But you gotta <clr:0000>get some momentum going<clr:ffff>
or it won't work. It can be kinda tricky
like that.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I may not look like it, but I used to be a
professional shield surfer, ya know.

I heard a rumor there was this <clr:0000>legendary
surfer<clr:ffff> somewhere in the <clr:0000>Hebra Mountains<clr:ffff>,
so I came here lookin' for 'em.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But, well, I didn't know their exact
location. Worse yet, I took a break here
and ended up surrounded by monsters.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, but if you need to know anything
about <clr:0000>shield surfing<clr:ffff>, at least I can help
with that.
Anything you don't understand about it,
just go ahead and ask me!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, hey, I got an idea! <sp:5:0:0>Mister, do you
know anything about <clr:0000>shield surfing<clr:ffff>?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:SurpriseM>Wh-what are you talking about?! I still
hear <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff> out there, don't you?!

You took too long gettin' ready, and
now we're surrounded again!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I-I said I'm sorry...<sp:0:4:0>You know, we really should have brought
a weapon with us, not just a shield.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you like that <clr:0000>shield<clr:ffff> over yonder, go
right ahead and use it. We brought plenty
of our own.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Scare_00>Look...<clr:0000>as long as you can hear monsters<clr:ffff>
out there, you don't open that door,
ya hear?
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Yammo! I think there's someone outside!
Maybe that person came back to save us!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Gaaah! What should we do?! We can't
go outside with all these <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>
everywhere!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseM>Wh-what are you saying?! Why would
anyone help us? This place is crawling
with monsters!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Huh? The<clr:0000> monsters<clr:ffff>... I can't hear
them anymore!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>Wh-what do we do?


We've got shields for shield surfing
and <clr:0000>spicy elixirs<clr:ffff> to resist the cold...
and that's it!
If <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>attack, we aren't gonna make
it are we?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseM>Wh-what are you talkin' about?! Don't
you hear those monsters?! I sure do!

Whatever you do, don't open the door
<clr:0000>if you can hear the sound of monsters<clr:ffff>!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_01>All we did was take a little break in here.
And now this! I can't believe the trouble
we're in.
*sigh* I wonder if the <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff> will,
I don't know, maybe just go somewhere
else soon.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Will we have to hide here for the rest of
our lives? It'll be just the two of us,
locked in here forever at this rate.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseS_00>Come on, Jogo! What's takin' you
so long?!

Quick! You gotta unlock the door!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>H-hey... It seems like it got quiet out
there all of a sudden.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Yammo...the truth is...we ran out of
the ingredients we need to make
<clr:0000>spicy elixirs<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>But the cold won't matter if we snuggle
up together.

Our love will melt the ice! Hehehe, um,
just kidding!
